title: Kan inhmuh kan intawh leh hma zawng
lyrics:
Kan inhmuh, kan intawh leh hma zawng,
Pathianin min lo hliahkhuh rawh se,
A thlarauvin min hruai rawh se,
Kan inhmuh kan intawh leh hma zawng.

Kan Lalpa hmunah chuan,
Kan inhmuh leh hma loh zawng,
Pathianin min veng se,
Kan inhmuh kan intawh leh hma zawng.

Kan inhmuh kan intawh leh hma zawng,
Tui lairapa kan lo awm leh,
Pathianin min hruai zel rawh se,
Kan inhmuh kan intawh leh hma zawng.

Kan inhmuh kan intawh leh hma zawng,
Hlim tlang taka kan lo awmin,
Aman min lawmpui selangin,
Kan inhmuh kan intawh leh hma zawng.

Kan inhmuh kan intawh leh hma zawng,
Thihna pawh kan lo tawh kher leh,
Pathianin min hnehsak rawh se,
Kan inhmuh kan intawh leh hma zawng.
